text:
On the awt screen at reload level,there is a null pointer exception at 
AWTStarter.java when I reload the document on line 156.
It seeems it is due to TransformerImpl.java:line 3407 in Xalan.

text: Fixed in FOP 0.94 and probably earlier versions
